description: From Japanese 旅館(りょかん) (ryokan), which is from Middle Chinese 旅館 (MC lɨʌX kuɑnH, “inn, traveller's lodge”).
Compare modern Chinese 旅館／旅馆 (lǚguǎn, “hotel”), from 旅 (lǚ, “travel”) + 館／馆 (guǎn, “lodging-house”).

entries.meaning: A traditional Japanese inn with communal baths and other public areas.
